description: f-vectors for simplicial complexes of dimension at most 1 (graphs) on at most n-1 vertices.
comments: The polynomial a(n) = (n^3 - 3n^2 + 8n + 6)/6 fits all listed terms. - _John W. Layman_, Mar 13 1999
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Luis Manuel Rivera, Integer sequences and k-commuting permutations, arXiv preprint arXiv:1406.3081, 2014
author: Svante Linusson (linusson(AT)math.kth.se)
